m:MaterialTitle.title: Parallax
m:MaterialTitle.description: Parallax is an effect where the background content or image in this case, is moved at a different speed than the foreground content while scrolling.

g:HTMLPanel.pre:
<m:MaterialParallax resource="{res.parallax1}" height="400"> <m:content> <m:MaterialTitle title="Parallax" description="Parallax is an effect where the background content or image in this case, is moved at a different speed than the foreground content while scrolling."/> </m:content> </m:MaterialParallax>
<m:MaterialParallax resource="{res.parallax2}" > <m:content> <m:MaterialTitle title="Parallax" description="Parallax is an effect where the background content or image in this case, is moved at a different speed than the foreground content while scrolling."/> </m:content> </m:MaterialParallax>
<m:MaterialParallax resource="{res.parallax3}" />

m:MaterialTitle.title: Parallax
m:MaterialTitle.description: Parallax is an effect where the background content or image in this case, is moved at a different speed than the foreground content while scrolling.
